::WarMachine/Alliance Base/Zardus/Bloodystrike/Reptilica::

WarMachine roars, seeing a star come out of nowhere and hit one of his 
missiles. He fires rapid laser shots at the spot where Koj was.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
The Alliance base's shields take the shots, the autoguns firing back 
at Inu.

The scanners were still scanning for cloaked bots. 'Seeing' that 
weaponfire had come out of nowhere, the scanners turn their attention 
toward that area, detecting Koj's cloaked signature. The computer 
beeps, reporting the location to Alliance members. 
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
The doors of the Alliance base open, Zardus exiting with Bloodystrike 
and Reptilica right behind him.

Recieving the computer's message, with the location of Koj, Zardus 
opens fire on that area with his plasma launcher, Bloodystrike and 
Reptilica standing at the door, also firing at Koj.
